MRDFeatureMap.FilterControlSignatures.ba.description: Base file name for output files.

MRDFeatureMap.FilterControlSignatures.cp.description: Number of cpus to use for this task. Default is 1.

MRDFeatureMap.FilterControlSignatures.di.description: Size of the local disk to use for this task, in GB. By default it is calculated from the input file sizes.

MRDFeatureMap.FilterControlSignatures.me.description: Amount of memory to use for this task, in GB. Default is 4 (GB).

MRDFeatureMap.FilterDb.base_file_name.description: Base file name for output files.

MRDFeatureMap.FilterDb.bcftools_extra_ar.description: Extra arguments to pass to bcftools view. For example, use '-f PASS' to only include variants with a PASS filter.

MRDFeatureMap.FilterDb.cpus.description: Number of cpus to use for this task. Default is 1.

MRDFeatureMap.FilterDb.disk_size.description: Size of the local disk to use for this task, in GB. By default it is calculated from the input file sizes.

MRDFeatureMap.FilterDb.memory_gb.description: Amount of memory to use for this task, in GB. Default is 4 (GB).

MRDFeatureMap.FilterMatched.base_file_na.description: Base file name for output files.

MRDFeatureMap.FilterMatched.cpus.description: Number of cpus to use for this task. Default is 1.

MRDFeatureMap.FilterMatched.disk_size.description: Size of the local disk to use for this task, in GB. By default it is calculated from the input file sizes.

MRDFeatureMap.FilterMatched.memory_gb.description: Amount of memory to use for this task, in GB. Default is 4 (GB).

MRDFeatureMap.base_file_name.description: Base file name for output files.

MRDFeatureMap.bcftools_extra_args.description: Extra argument given after the 'bcftools view' command that filters the matched and control signatures. E.g. '-f PASS' to filter only PASS variants.

MRDFeatureMap.cfdna_cram_bam.description: CRAM or BAM file of cfDNA sample, must be equal to the input used for the SingleReadSNV pipeline that generated cfdna_featuremap

MRDFeatureMap.cfdna_featuremap.description: FeatureMap file generated from the cfDNA CRAM file by the SingleReadSNV pipeline

MRDFeatureMap.create_md5_checksum_output.description: Create md5 checksum for requested output files

MRDFeatureMap.diluent_germline_vcfs.description: Optional germline VCF files from diluent samples to pad and exclude from analysis

MRDFeatureMap.exclude_regions.description: Genomic regions to exclude from the analysis, bed and vcf[.gz] files are accepted

MRDFeatureMap.external_control_signature.description: Optional signatures from other individuals to be used as controls in the MRD analysis

MRDFeatureMap.external_matched_signature.description: Optional signatures matched to the patient from whom the cfDNA sample was taken, to be used as matched signatures in the MRD analysis, leave blank if running a healthy control donor

MRDFeatureMap.featuremap_df_file.description: Parquet file of the FeatureMap model data generated by the SingleReadSNV pipeline

MRDFeatureMap.include_regions.description: Genomic regions to include in the analysis, bed files are accepted

MRDFeatureMap.mapping_quality_threshold.description: Mapping quality threshold for reads to be included in the coverage analysis, corresponding to the value used to filter the srsnv output

MRDFeatureMap.memory_extract_coverage_ov.description: Memory in GB to use for the coverage extraction task

MRDFeatureMap.n_synthetic_signatures.description: Number of synthetic signatures to generate from the somatic mutation database. Set to 0 to disable generation of control signatures from the database.

MRDFeatureMap.references.description: Reference files: fasta, dict and fai, recommended value set in the template

MRDFeatureMap.snv_database.description: Somatic mutation database to use for generating control signatures
